item.description:
UPDate 1/27/2012: Please note we have pushed the time of this event to 1:45pm arrival and will begin our game at 2:00pm. If you arrive after we have been assigned our starting time, you may not get in on our shift.

 

 

 

Let's go out to Lazer Craze for an afternoon of feeling like a kid again. We will meet in the lobby and then get an assigned time for play. Please be aware that we may be grouped with people who are not in our group, this includes small children.

Multi-Level Futuristic Fun!
The game is played in a multi-level futuristic arena filled with glowing pillars, arches, passageways and swirling fog. Players, whether individually or on teams, use their lasers to score as many points as possible by targeting opponents' vest sensors or attempting to overtake the opponents' base stations.

 

Pricing is as below:

Players One Session Two Sessions 1 to 10 $13* $22* 11 or more $12* $21*       One Session Four back-to-back games. A forty minute experience with briefing and vesting. Two Sessions Two four-game sessions - 8 games total!
Played in the same day by the same person

 

Please remember to take the Meetup Cell number (978-304-2811)with you in case you need to cancel at the last minute, running late or can not find us.

Bad weather will cancel this event, so please check back on the site prior to leaving for this event. The organizers will attempt to post any cancellations with atleast a one hour notice to the scheduled time of the event.

If you have not paid your dues for this year, please consider paying them to one of the oranizers at this event.

Hope to see you at Lazer Tag

Janet & Donna
item.name: Lazer Craze in North Andover
